item.title: 美国右翼媒体人士和科技先驱呼吁禁止超级智能人工智能
item.description: 据该倡议的非营利组织者称，包括美国右翼媒体人史蒂夫-班农（Steve Bannon）和格伦-贝克（Glenn Beck）在内的一个团体签署了一份声明，呼吁禁止开发超级智能人工智能，直到公众提出要求、科学铺平安全的道路。【原文：A group including right-wing U.S. media personalities Steve Bannon and Glenn Beck has signed a statement calling for a ban on developing superintelligent artificial intelligence until the public demands it and science paves a safe way forward, according to the non-profit organizers of the initiative.】

item.title: 股票下跌，黄金回调，因为 FOMO 购买得到了现实的检验
item.description: 周三，全球股市下滑，黄金也从大幅反弹中大幅回落，原因是估值捉襟见肘，投资者纷纷获利了结。【原文：Global shares slipped on Wednesday and gold pulled back sharply from a blistering rally, as stretched valuations came under scrutiny and investors booked profits.】

item.title: 空中客车公司在中国开设第二条喷气机组装线
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus）周三表示，该公司已在中国开设了第二条装配线，从而提高了其最畅销的 A320neo 系列单通道喷气机的生产能力。【原文：Airbus said on Wednesday it had opened a second assembly line in China, increasing manufacturing capacity for its best-selling A320neo family of single-aisle jets.】

item.title: 黄金暴跌引发市场波动，日元攀升
item.description: 周三亚市早盘，美元走软，兑日元汇率从一周来的最高水平回落，原因是金价暴跌引发了各种避险资产的再平衡。【原文：The U.S. dollar weakened in early Asian trade on Wednesday, edging back from its highest level against the Japanese yen in a week, as a tumble in gold prices triggered a rebalancing across various safe-haven assets.】

item.title: 三星 Galaxy XR 耳机将在谷歌和高通公司的帮助下与苹果一较高下
item.description: 三星电子周二发布了 Galaxy XR 延伸现实头戴式耳机，希望借助谷歌的人工智能功能，进军由 Meta 和苹果公司主导的新生且不确定的 "面对面计算 "市场。【原文：Samsung Electronics released its Galaxy XR extended reality headset on Tuesday, counting on AI features from Google to propel it into the nascent and uncertain market of computing-on-your-face that is dominated by Meta and Apple.】

item.title: 受供应风险和美国补充战略储备计划影响，石油维持涨势
item.description: 受制裁相关供应风险、中美贸易协议有望达成以及美国正在寻求向其战略储备交付石油的消息提振，周三油价连续第二天走高。【原文：Oil prices pushed higher for a second day on Wednesday, buoyed by sanctions-related supply risks, hopes of a U.S.-China trade deal and news that the U.S. is seeking oil for delivery to its strategic reserves.】

item.title: 印度接近达成协议，将美国对印度进口产品的关税降至 15-16%，《造币厂》报道
item.description: 印度《造币厂报》（Mint）周三援引三位知情人士的话报道称，印度和美国即将达成一项长期停滞不前的贸易协议，该协议将把美国对印度进口商品征收的关税从50%降至15%至16%。【原文：India and the United States are nearing a long-stalled trade agreement that would reduce U.S. tariffs on Indian imports to 15% to 16% from 50%, India's Mint reported on Wednesday citing three people aware of the matter.】

item.title: 马斯克与美国国家航空航天局局长达菲争夺航天局领导权
item.description: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）代理局长肖恩-达菲（Sean Duffy）和亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周二在网上就谁应该领导该航天局的问题展开了激烈的争论。【原文：Acting NASA chief Sean Duffy and billionaire Elon Musk on Tuesday traded barbs online over who should lead the space agency, a day after Duffy invited companies to compete with Musk's SpaceX for a moon landing mission.】

item.title: 消息称 Charter 裁员约 1200 人以精简公司职务
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周二告诉路透社，有线电视巨头 Charter Communications 正在裁员近 1200 人，占其 95000 名员工总数的 1%多一点。【原文：Cable giant Charter Communications is laying off close to 1,200 employees, or just over 1% of its 95,000-person workforce, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 淡水河谷认为 2025 年铁矿石产量将达到 2018 年以来的最高水平
item.description: 巴西矿商淡水河谷周二公布了自2018年以来最高的季度铁矿石产量，并表示其三大业务有望达到2025年产量目标的上限。【原文：Brazilian miner Vale reported on Tuesday its highest quarterly iron ore production since 2018, and said it is on track to reach the upper band of its 2025 production target for its three main businesses.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Anthropic 与谷歌就价值数百亿美元的云计算交易进行谈判
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，人工智能初创公司Anthropic正在与谷歌谈判，以获得额外的计算能力，价值高达数百亿美元。【原文：AI startup Anthropic is in talks with Google to secure additional computing power valued in the high tens of billions of dollars, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 奥姆尼康因广告业务强劲而实现季度收入增长
item.description: 广告公司宏盟（Omnicom）周二公布，受媒体和广告业务持续增长的帮助，第三季度收入增长了 4%。【原文：Advertising firm Omnicom on Tuesday posted a 4% rise in third-quarter revenue, helped by continued growth in its media and advertising segment.】

item.title: 德国北方数据公司撤回 2025 年预测
item.description: 德国北方数据公司（Northern Data）周二表示，由于这家人工智能云计算公司正在评估潜在的战略交易和图形处理单元的市场定价动态，因此撤回了其年度预测。【原文：Germany's Northern Data said on Tuesday that it had withdrawn its annual forecast, as the AI cloud company was evaluating potential strategic transactions and graphics processing unit's market pricing dynamics.】

item.title: 新研究显示，人工智能助手普遍存在新闻错误
item.description: 根据欧洲广播联盟（EBU）和英国广播公司（BBC）周三发表的最新研究报告，领先的人工智能助手在近一半的回答中对新闻内容进行了错误表述。【原文：Leading AI assistants misrepresent news content in nearly half their responses, according to new research published on Wednesday by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) and the BBC.】

item.title: 韩国谈判代表访美解决贸易谈判症结
item.description: 韩国高级官员将于周三访问华盛顿，在本月晚些时候举行的亚太地区峰会之前进行紧急讨论，旨在敲定一项关税协议，该协议因与 3,500 亿美元投资相关的细节问题而被搁置。【原文：Senior South Korean officials will visit Washington on Wednesday for urgent discussions aimed at finalising a tariff deal that has been on hold over details tied to a $350 billion investment, ahead of an Asia-Pacific summit later this month.】

item.title: 特朗普政府计划在停摆期间发放农民补助
item.description: 美国农业部周二表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府正计划向农民发放数十亿美元的援助，并在联邦机构持续停摆的情况下重新开放农业部的部分活动。【原文：The administration of President Donald Trump is planning to distribute billions in aid for farmers and reopen some activities of the U.S. Department of Agriculture amid the ongoing federal shutdown, the agency said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 德国 TeamViewer 公司 2025 年收入低于预期，原因是上半年业绩疲软
item.description: TeamViewer 周二表示，受最近收购的 1E 业务疲软的影响，该公司预计 2025 年的营收将低于其 7.78 亿欧元至 7.97 亿欧元（9.07 亿美元至 9.295 亿美元）的预期。【原文：TeamViewer said on Tuesday it expects revenue for 2025 at the lower end of its outlook of 778 million euros to 797 million euros ($907 million-$929.5 million), driven by weakness in its recently acquired 1E business.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，空客、泰雷兹和莱昂纳多即将达成欧洲航天业务合并协议
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周二报道，欧洲航空航天集团空中客车公司（Airbus）、泰雷兹公司（Thales）和莱昂纳多公司（Leonardo）即将就合并其航天业务达成协议。【原文：European aerospace groups Airbus , Thales and Leonardo are nearing an agreement on the merger of their space businesses, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 西部联盟利润因利息收入增加而上升，对贷款损失的担忧有所缓解
item.description: Western Alliance Bancorp 周二公布第三季度利润增长，原因是利息收入的增长和贷款费用的增加帮助抵消了雨天基金的增加，使其股价在延时交易中上涨了 4%。【原文：Western Alliance Bancorp reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Tuesday, as a rise in interest income and higher lending fees helped offset an increase in rainy day funds, sending its shares up 4% in extended trading.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，路威酩轩集团（LVMH）正在探索出售蕾哈娜（Rihanna）支持的芬迪美容公司（Fenty Beauty）50%的股份
item.description: 据四位知情人士透露，奢侈品巨头路威酩轩集团（LVMH）正在探索出售其持有的芬迪美容公司（Fenty Beauty）50%的股份。【原文：Luxury goods giant LVMH is exploring a sale of its 50% stake in Fenty Beauty, which it co-owns with Grammy Award-winning singer and entrepreneur Rihanna, according to four people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: GE Vernova 拟以 52.8 亿美元收购 Prolec 合资公司剩余股份
item.description: GE Vernova 周二表示，它将收购 Prolec GE 剩余的 50% 股份，后者是它与 Xignux 成立的非合并合资企业。【原文：GE Vernova said on Tuesday that it would acquire the remaining 50% stake of Prolec GE, its unconsolidated joint venture with Xignux.】

item.title: 交易日：股市势头减弱，黄金暴跌
item.description: 周二，美国股市涨跌不一，投资者消化了金价暴跌和美国政府进入第三周关门的影响，推动日本和其他几个股指创下新高的全球动能逐渐消失。【原文：U.S. stocks were mixed on Tuesday, with the global momentum that had lifted Japanese and several other indices to new highs fizzling out, as investors digested a sharp fall in gold prices and the U.S. government shutdown entering its third week.】

item.title: 巨灾损失减少，投资回报增加，丘博第三季度利润大增
item.description: 保险公司丘博周二公布第三季度利润增长，主要得益于巨灾损失减少、投资回报增加以及承保费用强劲。【原文：Insurance company Chubb reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Tuesday, helped by lower catastrophe losses, higher investment returns and strong underwriting fees.】

item.title: Sachem Head 称 Entain 的股票几年内可能翻番
item.description: Sachem Head Capital Management 预计，受需求增加以及与酒店、体育和娱乐公司米高梅（MGM）成立合资企业带来更好回报的推动，体育博彩和赌博公司 Entain 的股价在未来几年内可能翻番。【原文：Sachem Head Capital Management expects sports betting and gambling company Entain's shares could double in the coming years, fueled by increased demand and better returns from a joint venture with hospitality, sports and entertainment company MGM .】

item.title: 手术机器人需求强劲，直觉外科盈利超预期
item.description: 直觉外科公司（Intuitive Surgical）周二公布的第三季度利润和收入均好于预期，原因是用于微创手术的手术机器人需求不断增长。【原文：Intuitive Surgical on Tuesday reported better-than-expected third-quarter profit and revenue, driven by growing demand for its surgical robots used in minimally invasive procedures.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Stellantis 工厂在铝厂火灾后停产
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，由于关键部件短缺，位于密歇根州的一家 Stellantis 工厂将继续停产数周。【原文：A Stellantis plant in Michigan will remain shut down for several weeks due to a shortage of key components, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日经》报道：日本考虑让银行集团提供加密货币交易服务
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周三报道，日本金融监管机构正在酝酿允许银行集团成员推出加密货币交易服务，此举旨在扩大市场准入和促进竞争。【原文：Japan's financial regulator is mulling allowing members of banking groups to launch cryptocurrency trading services, in a move to expand market access and foster competition, the Nikkei reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: Meta 与蓝猫头鹰资本就路易斯安那州数据中心组建合资企业
item.description: Meta 公司周二表示，它与蓝猫头鹰资本（Blue Owl Capital）成立了一家合资企业，为其全球最大的数据中心项目提供资金，因为大型科技公司正竞相建设人工智能所需的基础设施。【原文：Meta said on Tuesday it formed a joint venture with Blue Owl Capital to fund its biggest data center project globally, as large technology companies race to build out the infrastructure needed to power their artificial intelligence ambitions.】

item.title: 芭比娃娃制造商美泰因北美市场疲软未达季度预期，股价暴跌
item.description: 本周二，美泰公司第三季度销售额和利润未达预期，原因是经济不确定性上升，北美地区玩具零售需求低迷。【原文：Mattel missed third-quarter sales and profit estimates on Tuesday, hurt by sluggish retail demand for its toys in North America amid rising economic uncertainty.】

item.title: Jana 持有六旗 9% 的股份，关注主题公园运营商的变革
item.description: 激进投资者 Jana Partners 持有六旗娱乐公司（Six Flags Entertainment）9% 的股份，并与橄榄球明星特拉维斯-凯尔斯（Travis Kelce）合作，推动这家主题公园运营商改善营销和客户体验。【原文：Activist investor Jana Partners owns a 9% stake in Six Flags Entertainment and has teamed up with football star Travis Kelce to push the theme park operator to improve marketing and customer experiences.】
